hero.title: Umnikezeli Wenkonzo Yokwakha Nolungiso
hero.subtitle: Asikhombi ngobuhle nje; sikumayelana nokudala isiseko esingenakundidhwa, esiginyayo nesibonwayo ngaphakathi nangaphandle.

about.title: Umbono Weshishini
about.description: I-Kanguya builders yaqala njengabasebenzi abaqhelekileyo bekhontraki ngo-2010 eKapa, eMzantsi Afrika, yathatha iiprojekthi ezincinci zokwakha eKapa. Ukusuka ngo-2010-2018, i-Kanguya builders yayaziwa njengoTrust Builders. Ekupheleni kuka-2018, i-Kanguya builders yafudukela eZambia apho yathatha iiprojekthi ezininzi zokwakha yatshintsha igama layo yaba yi-Kanguya Builders eLusaka kude kube ngu-2021. Ngo-2022, sabuyela eKapa, eMzantsi Afrika apho sazisekela ngokupheleleyo njengabadlali abanamandla kwishishini lokwakha, sithatha iiprojekthi ezincinci neziphakathi, senza imisebenzi yokulawula iiprojekthi, sinika iinkonzo ezigqwesileyo, sinikeza izisombululo zobunjineli kurhwebo kubathengi bethu.
about.visionText: Ukuba ngamakhongolose okwakha ahlonitshwayo kwaye sinikeze ngaphezulu kwelindelo ngalo lonke ixesha kwaye sifake isandla kwisicwangciso sophuhliso lweziseko zase-Afrika kwaye sidlale indima yokudala imisebenzi kubantu abancinci base-Afrika.

philosophyPoints.safety: Ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko nendawo yokusebenza efanelekileyo kwindawo ngalo lonke ixesha
philosophyPoints.planning: Ukudala ishedyuli eneenkcukacha kunye nesicwangciso sezixhobo ukuhlangabezana neenjongo zabathengi bethu
philosophyPoints.communication: Ukunxibelelana yonke imihla kubo bonke ababandakanyekayo kwiprojekthi

services.title: Iinkonzo Zethu Zokwakha
services.subtitle: Izisombululo ezipheleleyo zokwakha nolungiso ngeminyaka eli-14+ yamava
services.paintingDesc: Iinkonzo zobuchwephesha zokupeyinta ngaphakathi nangaphandle ngokugqibeleleyo
services.pavingDesc: Ukutyabaza kweendlela zokuhamba neendlela ezizeleyo ngemathiriyeli ahlala ixesha elide

footer.description: Wamkelekile ku-Kanguya Builders, umthombo owethembekileyo weenkonzo zokwakha nolungiso lwezakhiwo ezikwizinga eliphezulu. Ngamava angaphezu kweminyaka eli-14 kwishishini lokwakha, sikholelwa kakhulu ekunikezeleni izisombululo ezingenasiphako.
